# Past Papers - AI-Generated Exam Practice

> Past Papers is an AI-powered educational platform providing unlimited GCSE and A-Level practice questions with step-by-step solutions.

## What We Offer

- Unlimited AI-generated exam questions for GCSE and A-Level students
- Questions matching AQA, Edexcel, and OCR exam board specifications
- Step-by-step solutions with proper mark scheme notation (M1, A1, B1)
- Coverage of 12+ subjects including Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, English Literature
- Progress tracking and topic mastery indicators

## Key Features

- **Infinite Practice**: Never run out of questions - AI generates fresh questions for every subtopic
- **Exam-Accurate**: Questions match real exam style, difficulty, and mark allocation
- **Full Solutions**: Every question includes detailed working and examiner-style mark schemes
- **Required Practicals**: Complete coverage of practical assessment requirements

## Subjects Covered

### GCSE (Ages 14-16)
- Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology
- English Literature, History, Geography
- Psychology, Economics, Computer Science

### A-Level (Ages 16-18)
- Mathematics, Further Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology
- Economics, Psychology, English Literature

## Exam Boards

- AQA (Assessment and Qualifications Alliance)
- Edexcel (Pearson)
- OCR (Oxford, Cambridge and RSA)

## Website Structure

- `/gcse` - All GCSE subjects
- `/a-level` - All A-Level subjects
- `/gcse/{subject}/{examBoard}` - Subject-specific practice
- `/pricing` - Subscription options

## Contact

Website: https://pastpapers.co
